description: King Benjamin’s speech represents a high point in the righteousness of the people of Nephi and their willingness to receive and apply the teachings of righteous leaders (Mosiah 1:11). During Benjamin’s speech, his people respond in great faith and enter into a covenant to serve God. We have two brief samples of the words of the people, describing their response to the message of the angel who spoke to their king (Mosiah 4:2; 5:2-5).
